expo.name: Bcgh Connect
expo.description: Bcgh Connect helps staff manage attendance, schedules, and communication within Better Choice Group Homes.

infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Bcgh Connect may use your location while the app is open to help verify attendance and check-ins at scheduled appointments. This is optional and only applies when your role requires it.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Bcgh Connect may use your location in the background to provide reminders or verify check-in/out during scheduled shifts. Location use is limited to shift times and is not continuous tracking.
infoPlist.UIBackgroundModesDescription: Background location is used only to assist staff with attendance and check-in/out during scheduled shifts, if enabled.
infoPlist.NSRemindersUsageDescription: Bcgh Connect may send reminders for check-in and schedules to assist staff. This is optional.
infoPlist.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: Allow Bcgh Connect to use Face ID for secure authentication and faster logins. This is optional.
